summary: This document is an FBI interview summary (302 form) of Janusz Banasiak from November 19, 2021, conducted via WebEx. Banasiak, a former employee at Jeffrey Epstein's Palm Beach residence, describes the daily routine of young, non-professional 'school girls' arriving at the house to give Epstein massages, which he facilitated by letting them in. The document details the informal nature of these visits and the youth of the females involved.

persons.name: Janusz Banasiak
persons.role: Former employee at Epstein's Palm Beach house
persons.context: Interviewed by the FBI regarding his observations while working at Jeffrey Epstein's Palm Beach residence, specifically about the females who came to give massages.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.role: Resident of the Palm Beach house receiving massages
persons.context: Referred to as 'JE'; the individual for whom daily massages were arranged at his Palm Beach home, with the appointments facilitated by his assistants.

connections.description: Banasiak worked at Epstein's Palm Beach residence, where his duties included answering the door and letting in females who came for massage appointments.

events.title: FBI Interview of Janusz Banasiak
events.description: The FBI conducted a WebEx interview with Janusz Banasiak regarding his employment at Jeffrey Epstein's Palm Beach house and his observations of females arriving for massages.

locations: Palm Beach (referring to Jeffrey Epstein's residence there)
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein received between 2 and 4 massages every day when he was in Palm Beach.
The females who came to give massages were described as young, high-school-aged 'school girls' who were not professional, trained masseuses and did not bring equipment.

Janusz Banasiak's duties included receiving calls from Epstein's assistants about massage appointments, answering the doorbell, and letting the females into the house, where they often waited in the kitchen.
Banasiak observed that sometimes more than one female would arrive together, and he overheard them talking about school, soccer games, and classes.
The impression from the witness was that all the girls coming for massage appointments were under 20 years old.
